properties.description: Metadata-driven data ingestion from HTTP source pipeline.

ifTrueActivities.description: Copies population.tsv.gz from BLOB to population.tsv ADLS2

properties.description: for accessing GitHub big files > 1024 Kb

scriptLines: SelectReqFields2 split(indicator=='Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k' || indicator =='Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k',
pivotBy(indicator, ['Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k', 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k']),
